fields.descriptive_line: Copy of detailed plan of fourth floor of 1-10 Sumners Street, a loft conversion for Chris Lowe by Brookes Stacey Randall, 1994.
fields.physical_description: Copy of detailed plan of fourth floor of 1-10 Sumners Street, loft conversion. The drawing is over two sheets of tracing vellum taped together. Annotation is printed onto adhesive acetate.
fields.title: Detail PLAN 4th Floor
fields.location: Prints & Drawings Study Room, level D, case KK, shelf 1
fields.marks:
'ALAN BROOKES ASSOCIATES / ARCHITECTS + TECHNOLOGY CONSULTANTS / 34 BRUTON PLACE LONDON W1X 7AA TELEPHONE 071 495 2681 FAX 071 499 0733 / APARTMENT ONE 1-10 SUMNERS STREET LONDON EC1 / Detail PLAN 4th Floor  29/07/94   1:20'
 'ISSUED FOR CONSTRUCTION / Rev B'
 'ALL DIMENSIONS, RADII AND OFFSETS / FOR SETTING OUT SHOWN ON DRAWINGS / TO BE CHECKED ON SITE BY CONTRACTOR / TEMPLATES TO BE MADE OF CURVED WALLS'
 'GATE WITH BREAKGLASS ENTRY SYSTEM / Existing windows and sliding doors to / terrace made good as necessary. Floor / finish to be flush with top of lower frame. / ROOF TERRACE / Existing sliding screens / 220x300 trench heating with 50% free / area drilled Wisa BB/WG faced cover / plates over. / Line of existing coping. / EXTERNALLY ON UPPER TERRACE IN / WATERPROOF BOX / DIMMABLE SWITCHING TO MOONLIGHT / FITTING AND FLOODLIGHT OVER MAIN / ROOFLIGHT / RWP / EXISTING STEEL HANDRAIL / New stop to existing window to prevent / clash with new louvres / Existing spiral stair / Allow for formation of opening to take / tumble dryer discharge'
 'A 2795 B 3375 C 3400 D 3390 E 3395 F 2145'
 'LINING WALL ' 
'100mm dia grit blasted and patinated / stainless steel disc flush with FFL to take / end of stair fixed via shims to l section / below floor surface' 
'Vertical pivot screens 827.5mm wide / precurved / clear 8mm polycarbonate sheets with / self adhesive birch veneer bonded to / outer face of curved polycarbonate / sheets. Sheets to be fixed to stainless / steel 48mm RHS support and pivot / mechanism, with flush flush ball race at / head and base. Stainless steel pig nosed / bolts used throughout. / Note: Ball race to resist opening of / shutters past 135 deg . Screen next to / Party wall restricted to 90 deg / movement.'
'Staircase with toughned glass treads and / risers and stainless steel  stringers'
'Skirting 60mm shadow gap 25mm deep. / Wall edge to line through with floor panel / joint. Shadow recess finished in grey / Dulux 4502-Y.'
'Floor to be laid out symmetrically from / centre of main space. ( between bathroom / screen and inner lining wall.'
'Schauman Wisa T+G 12mm plywood / flooring / panels 1500x600 BBw/g faced / regularised with type A1 joint (flush no / bevel). / Subfloor to be renewed as necessary / Floor to be strengthened and leveled as necessary. Chipboard covering to be / relaid to allow new FFL of 12mm plywood / flooring to remain at existing floor level / 5 No floor boxes to main space each to / contain 6 13amp sockets, 1 TV and 1 / telephone point.'
'SWITCHING (ALL DIMMABLE) / PICTURE LIGHTS / VERTICAL PIVOTING SCREENS / CEILING DOWNLIGHTERS / UPPERTERRACE MOONLIGHT / LOWER TERRACE WALL LIGHT / BATHROOM FLUORESCENT TROUGH / LIGHTS / MEZZANINE DOWNLIGHTERS'
'Fully boxed stud wall with 2 skins / plasterboard and skim. Painted finish'
'Flush naturally anodised perforated folded / 4mm aluminium top hung sliding pivoting / screens with stretched lycra over / internal face'
'827.5  827.5  827.5  827.5  827.5  827.5  / 4965 / 4990 / 4805 / 817.5  817.5  817.5  107.5  927.5 / 820  817.5  817.5  817.5  205  60'
 'Pivoting glass louvres' 
'Birch slatted bench with white polyester / powder coated grilled tube radiator under'
'Washing machine with / tumble dryer over'
'Heated chromed Bisque towel rail BT / 120-50'
'SWITCH TO FLUORESCENT TROUGH / LIGHTING'
'Line of flush joint between plywood / flooring and limestone flooring'
'BATHROOM'
'Pietra laro grey limestone flooring / 800x600 module with tight fluch joints. / grid to be centred on centre of fixed wall / to bathroom'
'Stainless steel VOla Hemispherical / washbaisin with Stainless steel Vola Long / handled taps with fixed spout (Type / 1511l) Fluorescent lights and shaver / point to side. Stainless steel orbital / mirror fixed to partition.'
'SHAVER LIGHT SWITCH'
'Stainless steel shower rose over with / integral fibre optic light'
'Shower controls Stainless steel Vola Long / handled taps (Type 1511l)'
'1800mm dia Spun stainless steel bath / with enameld interior hung from / stainless steel 40mm RHS ring beam / welded to turned 34mm stainless steel / rod tripod support'
'Stainless steel Vola Long handled taps / with fixed spout (Type 1511l) / and hand shower'
'Laquered MDF sliding door'
'Laundrey cupboard with demountable MDF / shelving / Allow for 10 MDF Shelvesd on chromed / sleaved Hafele shelf supports / Grey limestone flooring '
'STAINLESS STEEL CHAIN AND LUG / SWITCH TO BULKHEAD'
'access hatch'
'SVP Existing'
' Fully boxed stud partition with mosaic / tiled finish with stainless steel drainage / chanel to falls under and stainless steel / chanel over wade grillage to air / extract'
'Hot water heater for bathroom'
'3NO MAINTAINANCE LIGHTS ON SINGLE / CIRCUIT SWITCHED ON OPENING OF EITHER / ACCESS PANALS'
'FIBRE OPTIC LIGHT SWITCHED TO SHOWER / CONTROL'
'Wall to opening to be reinforced with / security mesh, plywood and 25mm / plasterboard to internal face all fixed to / structural opening. Externally the wall / finished to match surrounding external / finish.'
'SWITCH TO HALO-LIGHT OVER WC'
'Wisa T+G plywood floor'
'Flush access panel'
'WC'
'Stainless steel WC filled with expanded / foam'
'Laquered MDF sliding door'
 'Party wall Lafarge system RCP 94 metal / stud and plasterboard wall'
'New wall formed from two layers / 12.5mm plasterboard and skim on 50mm / fully boxed studs at 450 mm centres with / noggins as necessary. / Paint finish Dulux 0500-N'
'ON MEZZANINE / ON OFF OVER RIDE SWITCHES TO ALL / DIMMABLE TO / VERTICAL PIVOTING SCREENS / CEILING DOWNLIGHTERS / FLOODLIGHT OVER MAIN ROOFLIGHT / UPPER TERRACE MOON LIGHT'
'2 piece stainless steel castings ( by / Charles Henshaw and sons). Base bolted / via 300x 300 I section to concrete slab. / Top casting fixed to base casting using SS / pig nosed bolts.'
'Outline of mezzanine over'
'Glass bridge over'
'Naturally aonised perforated folded 2mm / aluminium fascis panel to storage pods / fixed using SS pig nosed bolts'
 'Pod 1  Pod 2  Pod 3 / POD LIGHT SWITCH / Hifi and office   Hanging and clothes   Clothes and general / kitchen storage / STORAGE PODS / 3035 / Mobile Storage Pods / 2800x 930x 2085 moving 60mm above / FFL with 3 piece telescopic sliding / mechanism. Pods fabricated as steel / frame with lacquered MDF cladding. / Flexible storage system within. / POD LIGHT SWITCH / Exisiting plaster to external walls amde / good as necessary finished with Dulux / grey 4502-Y emulsion'
 '2820   2170 / 3090   1740   / 135  205  60    982   60   982   60   982   60   205   60   982   60   982   60  05   60  60  30  1065'
'LINING WALL'
'Curver toughned 10mm acid etched glass / screens fixed to casting supports using / flush counter sunk fittings'
'3340 / 10,000 rad'
' FD 30 S Fire door held open with solenoid / catches. 3 layer 10mm fire resistant / MDF laminated and curved with integral / smoke seal and intumescent strip. / Fixed to 30mm dia SS support.'
'DIMMABLE SWITCHING TO / PIVOTING GLASS SCREENS IN KITCHEN / WORKTOP DOWNLIGHTERS'
'60mm laminated birch counter top with / inset drawers. / Folded stainless steel sheet kitchen units / on galvanised 40x40 angle frame fixed / back to main steels in partition. / Each unit to have a pivoting sliding door to / front. / 7 No Wandsworth 50mm dia unswitched / sockets mounted on stainless steel cover / plate flush mounted onto stud wall 75mm / above worktop. / A switched fused spur (with accessible / switch position) to be behind each kitchen / unit. Each to have a circular stainless / steel cover plate flush mounted onto kitchen / wall.'
'KITCHEN'
'10mm Acid etched glass louvres bonded / to pivot mechanism on 40x20x2.5 SS / oval tube.'
'COOKER HOOD LIGHT AND EXTRACT FAN'
'Storage drawers / Fridge / Electric oven / Dishwasher / Waste and cleaning / Stainless steel cooker hood over'
'Spice cupboard within wall with two / layers plasterboard flushed internally. / 3 No MDF shelves. Flush MDF doors / shaped to match curve of the wall with / painted finish.'
'Spun stainless steel sink 510mm dia with / stainless stell waste and trap. / Stainless steel Vola mixer taps and spout / fixed on wall with 20mm rod towel rail / set into counter top / Similar detailing as bathroom washbasin.'
 'Hydralic reservoir tank and water tank / over'
'Drilled acid etched pivoting door to / display cupboard with stainless steel / counter sunk fittings and pivot. Cupboard / to have acid etched glass shelves / Allow for 5 Glass Shelves on chromed / sleaved Hafele shelf supports'
'HALLWAY (FIRE LOBBY)'
'EXG. SVP STACK'
'Mobile aluminium ladder'
'MDF shelving'
'Cloakroom with raised floor'
'Naturally anodised perforated 4mm / aluminium sliding screen'
'1 Hour fire rated stud partition'
'4820 rad   25  1085 / 1000'
'Cloakroom with raised floor'
'HALL CUPBOARD SWITCH'
'12 No stainless steel elementer coat / hooks.'
'Mobile aluminium ladder'
'MDF shelving'
'Floor safe behing flush floor panel within / cupboard. Safe to link to alarm system / and be bolted to concrete subfloor.'
'NON DIMMABLE SWITCHING TO / HALL CUPBOARD FLUORESCENT / VERTICAL PIVOTING SCREENS / PIVOTING GLASS SCREENS IN KITCHEN / SECURITY TIMER SWITCH FOR LIGHTS / ENTRANCE LIGHT / HALL GLASS CUPBOARD / ON OFF OVER RIDE SWITCH FOR LEAVING / FLAT'
'CONTROL PANELS (Refer to section EE)'
'Wall to entrance to be reinforced with / security mesh, plywood and 25mm / plasterboard to internal face. mesh and / plywood to be screwed to existing stud supports.'
'Coir door mat   Entrance Door'
'LETTER BOX'
''Wormald entrance security door faced / with polyester powder coated finished / steel. No letterbox. Central spyhole. / Oppositely hinged to existing door.'
'All doors to exterior to be fitted with / intruder sensors'
'Letter box formed into wall with flush / external Stainless steel coverplate and / internal 40mm thick birch shelf within / 300x 300 recess'
 'EXISTING GLAZING WITH WINDOWS SHOWN IN FULL OPEN POSITION / Existing made good and finished as / necessary' 
'Line of existing coping'
'100x300 trench heating with 50% free / area driled Wisa BB/WG faced cover / plates over / Reinforced as necessary to prevent / warping'
'Full height acid etched toughened glass / screen fixed to SS 40x 20 oval tube using / flush countersunk fittings. Oval tube to / have flush ball race at head and base. / These to resist door opening beyond clash / point with wall.'
'1 hour Fire resisitant acid etched glazed / screen (pyrostop)'
'Gas fired boiler with balanced flue. / Exisiting glass panels of window replaced / with solid panels'
'1 MAINTENANCE LIGHT SWITHCED TO / OPENING OF ACCESS DOOR'
 'FOURTH FLOOR PLAN / mezzanine study shower in outline / FD30S / Fire Door / Hallway / Kitchen / Bathroom / Bath / WHB / WC / Laundrey cupboard / Existing SVP / 14. / A / E / G / F / H / A / B / C / D / H / F / E /D /C /B'

fields.location: Prints & Drawings Study Room, level D

fields.name: Prints & Drawings Study Room, level D

fields.history_note: Copy of original working drawing for Chris Lowe loft apartment, Sumners Street, London, EC1 designed by architects Brookes Stacey Randell.

Attribution note: Copy of original
Reason For Production: Commission
